channel.description: Recent content in Twazr on Argolon Solutions

item.title: Coworking and Twitter come together in Twazr
item.description: James over at Eirepreneur has very neatly brought together the idea of Coworking with Twitter. He has taken the Twitter feeds of a set of Irish developers and freelancers that he knows and spliced them into Grazr. It provides a single combined feed of a set of people who are all in Ireland, work in similar areas and know each other to some degree. It gives that extra bit of socialisation that freelancers need.
